Decision_Rationale: Natural gas generator (30% acceptance) cannot handle 497kW GPU step. Grid-forming BESS required for islanded operation.
Load sequencing reduces effective step to <200kW. Buffer BESS sufficient for transient support.
Diesel generator (70% acceptance) can handle GPU step. Buffer BESS for ride-through only.
Fast-response natural gas (100% block load) can handle step. Buffer BESS for ride-through.
CG260 (16% first step) cannot handle 1998.5kW step. Grid-forming BESS required.
Load sequencing reduces effective step. Smaller grid-forming BESS sufficient.
Small cluster (â‰¤4 GPUs) with fast-response generator. No-BESS viable with proper controls.
Medium cluster (16 GPUs) with standard natural gas. Buffer BESS recommended.
Large cluster (64 GPUs) with islanded operation. Grid-forming BESS required.
Lean-burn natural gas (25% acceptance) cannot handle step. Grid-forming BESS required.
Rich-burn natural gas with load sequencing. Buffer BESS sufficient.
